statement.p: The area of a triangle is given by the formula \displaystyle{A}=\frac{{1}}{{2}}{b}{h}, where \displaystyle{A} is the area of the triangle, \displaystyle{b} is its base and \displaystyle{h} is its height.
Find the base of the triangle with height of \displaystyle{8} meters and area of \displaystyle{94} square meters. Write your answer as a decimal, rounded to the nearest hundredth, when necessary.
